problem.p:
Two particles have masses \(3m\) and \(2m\) and speeds \(v\) and \(2v\), respectively. In each of the three different scenarios, the particles collide inelastically.
Scenario A. The particles move toward each other and collide head-on.
Scenario B. Particle \(2m\) chases particle \(3m\) and collides with from behind.
Scenario C. The particles move at right angles before the collision.
Rank these three scenarios in the order of decreasing speed after the collision .
